entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
